Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPOptionsWidth = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsWidth ~= nil then self:SetText(OPOptionsWidth) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPOptionsObjectID = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsObjectID ~= nil then self:SetText(OPOptionsObjectID) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPOptionsHeight = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsHeight ~= nil then self:SetText(OPOptionsHeight) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then ScaleObject:Enable() self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPOptionsScale = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) ScaleObject:Disable() elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) ScaleObject:Disable() ScaleObject:SetChecked(false) end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsScale ~= nil then self:SetText(OPOptionsScale) end

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPOptionsScaleTog = true else OPOptionsScaleTog = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsScaleTog == true then self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPOptionsLength = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsLength ~= nil then self:SetText(OPOptionsLength) end

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPOptionsSpawnOnMove = true else OPOptionsSpawnOnMove = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsSpawnOnMove == true then self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnMouseUp: if Bifold:GetChecked() == true then Bifold:SetChecked(false) end
if Halve:GetChecked() == true then Halve:SetChecked(false) end

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPOptionsMoveObject = true else OPOptionsMoveObject = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPOptionsMoveObject == true then self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotXEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderX:SetValue(OPRotXEditVal) end

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValX = self:GetValue() local OPRotSliderValX = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValX,3) OPRotationEditBoxX:SetText(OPRotSliderValX) OPRotateObject(); end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotYEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderY:SetValue(OPRotYEditVal) end

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValY = self:GetValue() local OPRotSliderValY = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValY,3) OPRotationEditBoxY:SetText(OPRotSliderValY) OPRotateObject(); end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotZEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderZ:SetValue(OPRotZEditVal) end

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValZ = self:GetValue() local OPRotSliderValZ = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValZ,3) OPRotationEditBoxZ:SetText(OPRotSliderValZ) OPRotateObject(); end

Scripts.OnUpdate: local xpos, ypos = GetCursorPosition() local xmin, ymin = Minimap:GetLeft(), Minimap:GetBottom() xpos, ypos = xmin-xpos/UIParent:GetScale()+70, ypos/UIParent:GetScale()-ymin-70 MinimapPos = math.deg(math.atan2(ypos,xpos)) ObjectManipulator_MinimapButton:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", "Minimap", "TOPLEFT", 52-(80*cos(MinimapPos)), (80*sin(MinimapPos))-52)
